channel.title: Changing pass?
channel.description: ok on my server the pass shows as password encryptions..like 92-2930-290 and stuff ok so when i type ::pass *newpass* it changes the pass to words instead of password encryption and when you try to log in it says invalid..how do i make it if you type ::pass *newpass* the new pass is still password encryptied

item.title: Changing pass?
item.dc:creator: @blade9670 blade9670
item.description:
@blade9670 wrote:

why you guys flaming this guy for just having encryted passwords it comes with a pimpscape source !!!
Heres a simple tutorial on how to rid of the encrytion:

Warning: Do not attempt this tutorial if you already have saved games.
Logins will fail because passwords are randomnized before dencryption.
Otherwise, go right ahead.

Purpose: Password Dencryption

Difficulty: Easy

Assumed Knowledge: Deletion

Server Base: PimpScape - Possibly new versions of CheezScape

Class Modified: Client.java

Procedure:

Step One:
Search and delete:

[code]/*PASSWORD ENCRYPTION - IF I EVER NEED A HOST I DON’T NEED TO WORRY ABOUT PW ***!/
private static String getString( byte[] bytes )
{
StringBuffer sb = new StringBuffer();
for( int i=0; i<bytes.length; i++ )
{
byte b = bytes[ i ];
sb.append( ( int )( 0x00FF & b ) );
if( i+1 <bytes.length )
{
sb.append( “-” );
}
}
return sb.toString();
}

private static byte[] getBytes( String str )
{
ByteArrayOutputStream bos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer( str, “-”, false );
while( st.hasMoreTokens() )
{
int i = Integer.parseInt( st.nextToken() );
bos.write( ( byte )i );
}
return bos.toByteArray();
}

public static String md5( String source )
{
try
{
MessageDigest md = MessageDigest.getInstance( “MD5” );
byte[] bytes = md.digest( source.getBytes() );
return getString( bytes );
}
catch( Exception e )
{
e.printStackTrace();
return null;
}
}
/////////////////////////////END OF ENCRYPTION/////////////////////////////////////////[/code]

Step two:
Search and delete:

String hashPW = md5(playerPass); playerPass = hashPW;

Step three:
Search for:

if (command.startsWith("pass") && command.length() > 5) { playerPass = command.substring(5); String hashPW = md5(playerPass); playerPass = hashPW; sendMessage("Your new password is "+command.substring(5)); }

Step four:
Replace with mines:

if (command.startsWith("pass") && command.length() > 5) { playerPass = command.substring(5); sendMessage("Your new password is "+command.substring(5)+"."); }

Credits: Azn


[/quote]

THIS GOES 100% credits Azn

This is your best option save all the character files.
Let everyone remake there accounts and copy and paste there info back to corresponding accounts

Read full topic
